field.label: Enable Cart2Quote
field.comment: Choose to enable Cart2Quote.

field.label: Enter Order #
field.comment: Please enter Order # or Payment Reference ID and press Validate License.

field.label: Frontend Quotation Visibility
field.comment: Show Quotation features in Frontend.

field.label: Make Products Quotable by Default
field.comment: Configure default global value for all catalog products.

field.label: Enable Move to Quote
field.comment: Allow customers to transfer their Cart to the Quote.

field.label: Enable Move to Cart
field.comment: Allow customers to transfer their Quote Items directly to the Shopping Cart.

field.label: Enable Quote A Wish
field.comment: Allow customers to transfer their Wish List to the Quote

field.label: Enable Direct Quote
field.comment: If enabled, customers will be able to request proposals directly from their shopping cart. If autoproposal module is installed, customers will receive proposal automatically based on catalog prices. see here for documentation.

field.label: Enable Print Quote
field.comment: If enabled, customers will be able to print proposals from the product page. (Only on Quote List strategy)

field.label: Replace Quote Button for Guests
field.comment: Disable the 'Add to Quote' button for non logged in users, and replace with login message.

field.label: Add Button on Detail Page
field.comment: Choose to display the "Add to Quote" button on Product Detail Page. see here for documentation.

field.label: Add Button on Category Page
field.comment: Choose to display the "Add to Quote" button on Product Category Page. see here for documentation.

field.label: Dynamic add to cart/quote buttons
field.comment: Show the buttons based on child products saleable/quotable configuration (Configurable products only).

field.label: Display Mini Quote Icon
field.comment: Display the Mini Quote icon on the frontend.

field.label: Enable Mini Quote
field.comment: Display the Mini Quote popup on the frontend.

field.label: Default Proposal Expiration Time
field.comment: Quotation proposals will expire after the given number of days. Set to "0" to disable this feature.

field.label: Default Reminder Time
field.comment: Quote proposal reminder will be sent to customer after the given number of days. Set to "0" to disable this feature.

field.label: Show Quotation Notices to:
field.comment: Choose which admin to notify of unanswered quotations. Notification will be received through Magento admin notification panel.

field.label: Display Product Thumbnail
field.comment: Choose to show product thumbnail in the quotation proposal PDF.

field.label: Quote PDF Footer Text
field.comment: This text will be rendered at the bottom of the PDF.

field.label: Enable product short description
field.comment: Choose to display product short description in the Proposal PDF.

field.label: Display payment instructions
field.comment: Choose to show customers payment instructions in the PDF print-outs.

field.label: Display Tax
field.comment: Tax display option.

field.label: Save space on fonts
field.comment: The default Magento PDF font will be replaced with Times New Roman to save approx. 2MB of space.

field.label: Enable Quotation Request Emails
field.comment: If enabled, customer will be notified of their pending quotation request.

field.label: Quote Request Email Sender
field.comment: Choose the sender of the email (to: field).

field.label: Quote Request Template
field.comment: See Transactional E-Mails

field.label: Send Quote Email Copy To:
field.comment: Multiple email addresses should be comma-separated.

field.label: Send Quote Email Copy Method
field.comment: Choose to send email copy as separate email or carbon copy.

field.label: Hide Item Price
field.comment: Choose to hide item price in quote request email.

field.label: Display Product Thumbnail
field.comment: Choose to show the product thumbnail in quote request email.

field.label: Enable Quote Proposal Email
field.comment: When enabled, customers will be sent an email upon receiving proposal of their quote request.

field.label: Attach pdf
field.comment: Attach Quote PDF to your proposal mail (Requires Business edition or greater). see here for documentation.

field.label: Attach document
field.comment: Upload any file as default attachment to the proposal email. (i.e. Terms and Conditions) NOTE: Some providers limit the size of emails.

field.label: Rename Attached Document
field.comment: If empty, original document name will be used.

field.label: Quote Proposal Email Sender
field.comment: Choose the sender of the proposal email (from: field).

field.label: Choose Quote Proposal Template
field.comment: See Transactional E-Mails

field.label: Send Quote Proposal Email Copy To:
field.comment: Multiple email addresses should be comma-separated.

field.label: Send Quote Email Copy Method
field.comment: Choose to send email copy as separate email or carbon copy.

field.label: Display Product Thumbnail
field.comment: Choose to show product thumbnail in quote proposal email.

field.label: Enable Accepted Proposal Email
field.comment: When enabled, configured admin will receive confirmation of their accepted proposal.

field.label: Quote Proposal Accepted Template
field.comment: See Transactional E-Mails

field.label: Send Quote Proposal Accepted Email Copy To:
field.comment: Multiple email addresses should be comma-separated.

field.label: Send Quote Email Copy Method
field.comment: Choose to send email copy as separate email or carbon copy.

field.label: Choose Quote Proposal Rejected Email Receiver
Quote Proposal Rejected Template
field.comment: See Transactional E-Mails

field.label: Send Quote Proposal Rejected Email Copy To
field.comment: Comma-separated

field.label: Send Quote Email Copy Method
field.comment: Choose to send email copy as separate email or carbon copy.

field.label: Enabled
field.comment: When enabled, customers will receive email notification of their expired quotation proposals. see here for documentation.

field.label: Quote Proposal Expire Email Sender
field.comment: Choose the sender of the expired proposal email (to: field).

field.label: Choose Quote Proposal Expired Template
field.comment: See Transactional E-Mails

field.label: Send Quote Proposal Expiry Email Copy To:
field.comment: Multiple email addresses should be comma-separated.

field.label: Send Expired Quote Email Copy Method
field.comment: Choose to send email copy as separate email or carbon copy.

field.label: Enable Quote Reminder Email
field.comment: When enabled, customer will receive a quotation reminder. see here for documentation.

field.label: Quote Reminder Email Sender
field.comment: Choose the sender of the reminder email (to: field).

field.label: Select Quote Reminder Template
field.comment: See Transactional E-Mails

field.label: Send Quote Reminder Email Copy To:
field.comment: Multiple email addresses should be comma-separated.

field.label: Send Quote Email Copy Method
field.comment: Choose to send email copy as separate email or carbon copy.

field.label: Enable Modified Quotation Email
field.comment: When enabled, customers will receive an email notifying them of changes made to their quote proposal.

field.label: Quote Edited Email Sender
field.comment: Choose the sender of the email (to: field).

field.label: Modified Quote Email Template
field.comment: See Transactional E-Mails

field.label: Send Quote Edited Email Copy To:
field.comment: Multiple email addresses should be comma-separated.

field.label: Send Quote Email Copy Method
field.comment: Choose to send as separate email or carbon copy.

field.label: Enable Canceled Quote Email
field.comment: When enabled, customers will receive an email notifying them of the quote cancellation.

field.label: Choose Canceled Quote Email Sender
field.comment: Choose the sender of the cancellation email (to: field).

field.label: Select Canceled Quote Template
field.comment: See Transactional E-Mails

field.label: Send Quote Canceled Email Copy To:
field.comment: Multiple email addresses should be comma-separated.

field.label: Send Quote Email Copy Method
field.comment: Choose to send email copy as separate email or carbon copy.

field.label: Quote Follow-Up Template
field.comment: See Transactional E-Mails

field.label: Send Quote Follow-Up Email Copy To
field.comment: Comma-separated

field.label: Send Quote Email Copy Method
field.comment: Choose to send email copy as separate email or carbon copy.

field.label: Extra Global CSS
field.comment: Global CSS, so selectors are allowed.

field.label: Extra CSS for the miniquote icon
field.comment: Inline CSS, so selectors are not allowed.

field.label: Display "Quote Created By" data on the frontend
field.comment: Display the "quote created by" data on the customer's frontend quotation view.

field.label: Show Quote Discount
field.comment: Show total discount on PDF/E-mail/Customer dashboard. Choose dynamic to only show discount when available.

field.label: Enable Custom Request Form
field.comment: Add Custom Form Request to your storefront. Ensure product exists in your catalog and is visible in your required store-view(s). see here for documentation.

field.label: Custom Request Form Name
field.comment: Rename the Custom Request Form. (optional)

field.label: Hide Dashboard Prices
field.comment: Hide item price and quote totals from customer dashboard "My Quotes" if no proposal has been created.

field.label: Show Dashboard Product Thumbnail
field.comment: Display product thumbnails on customer dashboard.

field.label: Lock Proposal
field.comment: When enabled, items cannot be removed or added to the shopping cart after proposal has been accepted.

field.label: Enable Proposal Rejection
field.comment: Offer customers the ability to reject quotation proposals

field.label: Enable Frontend Tier Quantity Request
field.comment: When enabled, customers will be able to add tier quantities to items from frontend.

field.label: Enable file upload to quote
field.comment: When enabled, customers will be able to add files to quote from frontend.

field.label: Allowed file extensions
field.comment: Separate with comma ",". For example jpg, png, pdf

field.label: Convert Custom Price
field.comment: When changing currency for quote in backend, convert the current custom price to the required currency.

field.label: Quote Prefix
field.comment: Set the Quote Prefix for your store. Default is Q15.

field.label: Enable Backend Stock Check on Quotation
field.comment: When enable, out of stock items cannot be added to quotation backend.

field.label: Enable Frontend Stock Check on Quotation
field.comment: When enabled, out of stock items cannot be added to quotation frontend. (When disabled, please enable 'Cart2Quote>Quotation>Global>Dynamic add to cart/quote buttons')

field.label: Auto User Login
field.comment: Adds links to proposal email which enables automatic user login. see here for documentation.

field.label: Use Auto Confirm Proposal
field.comment: The checkout button in the proposal email, links directly to the checkout page. Select 'No' if you want customers to first visit the customer dashboard.

field.label: Enable Alternative Checkout
field.comment: Configure alternative checkout methods in Stores->Configuration->Sales->Payment Methods.

field.label: Alternative Checkout URL
field.comment: Enter alternative checkout url. Example: "alternative/checkout".

field.label: Disable Customer Checkout On Quote
field.comment: Disables proceed to checkout after receiving quote proposal.

field.label: Remove The Coupon Input Field For Quotations
field.comment: Choose to remove the coupon input field if order was quoted.

field.label: Disable Product Comment Field
field.comment: When disabled, product specific remarks field will be removed from quotation request page. see here for documentation.

field.label: Enable Internal Comments
field.comment: Not visible for customers.

field.label: Disable Negative Profit
field.comment: Disable to prevent a negative profit in proposal calculation.

field.label: Disable Frontend Quote Changes Visibility
field.comment: Choose whether to disable frontend quote proposal update visibility. When enabled; original product prices quantities, etc will be "frozen" on frontend view, while proposal is applied and visible only from the backend.

field.label: Quote Statuses
field.comment:
No Limitation: Everything can be done in quote.
Locked: Everything is locked except 'Save', 'Edit Quote', 'Quote Status' and 'Preview Quote PDF'.
Finalized: Everything is locked except 'Edit Quote' and 'Preview Quote PDF'.

field.label: Item Configuration
field.comment: Select which information columns should be displayed on the quote items

field.label: Enable Submission Form
field.comment: When enabled, Cart2Quote places a form besides the quote list. When disabled the customer is required to log in or register before submitting a quote. see here for documentation.

field.label: Allow Guest Request
field.comment: When enabled, store visitors can submit a request without a Magento account being created. see here for documentation.

field.label: Quote Request Existing Customers
field.comment: When enabled, existing store customers can submit a request without login to the account first.

field.label: Show Shipping Methods
field.comment: When enabled, store visitors can select shipping method. Disabling shipping options requires Quotation Shipping to be enabled. see here for documentation.

field.label: Email or Phone Request
field.comment: When enabled, store visitors can decide between email and phone call quotes.

field.label: Automatically Log In New Customers
field.comment: When enabled, new store visitors will be automatically logged in after requesting quote.

field.label: Billing Address Configuration
field.comment: Drag and drop to change the sort order. Fields can be set to required. see here for documentation.

field.label: Shipping Address Configuration
field.comment: Drag and drop to change the sort order. Fields can be set to required. see here for documentation.
